jobsJson.descriptionPlain: The Head of Analytics is responsible for the strategy, design, implementation, and impact of Gojek Group’s BI team. This role will have authority on the use of Business Intelligence strategies to drive innovation, commercial, and enterprise objectives across all of Gojek Group subsidiaries and countries. This role is based in Jakarta (Indonesia), requires travel, and will be responsible for the Business Intelligence teams under the Engineering function. The role reports directly to the Group CDO.
jobsJson.description: The Head of Analytics is responsible for the strategy, design, implementation, and impact of Gojek Group’s BI team. This role will have authority on the use of Business Intelligence strategies to drive innovation, commercial, and enterprise objectives across all of Gojek Group subsidiaries and countries. This role is based in Jakarta (Indonesia), requires travel, and will be responsible for the Business Intelligence teams under the Engineering function. The role reports directly to the Group CDO.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

lists.content:
• Leading, growing and scaling the organization (will be 100+ by 2020)so that it continues to support the company's use of data in its decision making
  • Strategy-making & future proofing the team’s technical and personal capabilities for learning & development
  • Coordinating cross-functional collaboration: driving efficiency and efficacy across the BI Organization
  • Own and develop relationships with senior executives from C-levels, Business, Product and Tech
  • Promotion & Salary Adjustment decisions of all employees in the Functional Organization
  • Headcount costs & Performance Evaluation of employees in the Functional Organization
  • Staffing Decisions Management

• 5+ years of experience working in data-focused fields, data management, data architecture, data model design, data governance, and developing the underlying technologies needed to enable data innovation across a large enterprise with startup speed
  • 5+ years of demonstrated management experience with strategic alignment, relationship management, and leading/ mentoring teams 
  • Demonstrable experience in the use of analytics to inform business decisions (in more than one industry)
  • Thrives under intense pressure
  • SQL is a must
  • Stakeholder management – Senior managerial to Junior managerial
  • Organisational and business strategy experience
  • Experience with engineering high volume streaming data pipelines
  • Strong programmatic analytics skills (R, Python, etc)
